definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: This week on the gadget Show, we find out what the best printers on the market are.
sentences.chinese: 在本週的小器具展上我們發現了市場上最好的打印機。

sentences.english: Eating utensils and food trays are cleaned at the hygiene station with premoistened towelettes.
sentences.chinese: 就餐器具和食物盤在衛生站用預先弄溼的小毛巾清理。

sentences.english: Wash and disinfect all surfaces and utensils that have been in contact with the raw meat.
sentences.chinese: 清洗和消毒與生肉接觸的所有表面和器具。

sentences.english: He wanted to do a time recording equipment, a good make up for lack of a sundial.
sentences.chinese: 他就想再做一件記時器具，好彌補日晷的不足。

sentences.english: The measurement devices used in hydrologic monitoring shall pass the inspection according to law.
sentences.chinese: 水文監測所使用的計量器具應當依法經檢定合格。

sentences.english: A nurse anesthetist unearthed a nest.
sentences.chinese: 一名護理麻醉師掘出一套器具。
日本瓦斯器具檢查協會。

sentences.english: Dynamometer is a kind of appliance for sports and rehabilitation training.
sentences.chinese: 測力計是體育運動與康復訓練的器具。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a biphase culturing bottle belonging to the technical field of a bacteria culture appliance.
sentences.chinese: 一種雙相培養瓶，屬於細菌培養器具技術領域。

sentences.english: When the sparger has a bubble cap, the gas holdup becomes high.
sentences.chinese: 當分佈器具有泡罩結構時，對應的氣含率較高。

sentences.english: After washing the feeding and preparation equipment, rinse thoroughly in safe water.
sentences.chinese: 在清洗餵養和配製器具後，再用安全飲水徹底沖洗。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a teaching aid for communication between teacher and students: hand-up device.
sentences.chinese: 課堂舉手器，它涉及一種課堂師生交流的教學器具。

sentences.english: Behold, I will make thee a new sharp threshing i.
sentences.chinese: 我已使你成爲有快齒打糧的新器具。

sentences.english: Parents should be very cautious when preparing food. The table and utensils used need to be clean.
sentences.chinese: 家長應十分謹慎準備食物，桌子和器具必須清潔。

sentences.english: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.
sentences.chinese: 作燈臺和這一切的器具要用精金一他連得。

sentences.english: Disclosed is an automatic sounding and counting instrument for pulse which is a medical apparatus suitable for feeling the pulse in traditional Chinese medical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 脈搏自動發聲計數儀是一種適於中醫切脈的醫療器具。
